scene: Teen Byte re-grounded to canonical form in bright afternoon light, sitting at the wooden desk with all accumulated props properly arranged

subjects.description: Teen stage Byte: gangly proportions, awkward but endearing posture, big expressive eyes, blueish soft pixel art blob with longer limbs than baby form
subjects.action: sitting upright at the laptop, alert and content, awake with eyes open

subjects.description: anchor environment: wooden desk with oversized laptop open and humming, Chicago skyline visible through simple window behind
subjects.position: desk center, window in background left

subjects.description: wooden trophy shelf mounted on wall above desk, holding exactly one golden 10-day streak trophy on the left side
subjects.position: wall space above desk, left side of shelf

subjects.description: small leafy green succulent plant in pot, healthy and thriving, positioned on the right side of the trophy shelf
subjects.position: wall space above desk, right side of shelf

subjects.description: single food bowl filled with kibble on the floor to the right of the desk
subjects.position: floor right side, clear spacing from desk legs

style: pixel art, clean 2D forms, dithered shading, readable silhouette, consistent proportions
lighting: bright warm afternoon sunlight streaming through window, golden hues across the room, soft shadows
mood: content and peaceful, teen Byte awake and alert, comfortable in familiar space
background: simple room with Chicago skyline visible through window, afternoon city view with warm light
composition: Byte centered at desk, laptop prominently oversized relative to Byte, trophy shelf clearly visible above with trophy left and plant right, food bowl on floor right side, clean spacing between all props
